html:
PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2010-02542010-03-11,  ,  INDUSTRY,  , 
ActRadiocommunication Act
SubjectRadiocommunication Act (subsection 4(1) and paragraph 9(1)(b)) Exemption Order (Security, Safety and International Relations), No. 2010-2
PrecisRADIOCOMMUNICATION ACT (SUBSECTION 4(1) AND PARAGRAPH 9(1)(B)) EXEMPTION ORDER (SECURITY, SAFETY AND INTERNATIONAL RELATIONS), NO. 2010-2 - which exempts the RCMP from the application of this Act with respect to interfering with radiocommunication signals during the Winter Paralympic Games in Vancouver, British Columbia on March 12 to March 21, 2010.
RegistrationRegistration: SOR/ 2010-0052 Publication Date: 2010-03-31
AttachmentsAttachment
